novelty_axis: Consensus clustering + multi-view similarity fusion + stability diagnostics (NVI/ARI) for binary genotype-phenotype matrices
scope_boundary: No pairwise association inference; no MDR ontology/hypergraph; no phylogenetic comparative models
methodological_uniqueness: Bootstrap consensus matrix (Monti 2003), NVI stability paths (Meila 2007), persistent homology on Hamming-distance Vietoris-Rips complex, SHAP with bootstrap CI, Cliff delta effect size

softwarex_positioning.primary_user_story: Clustering/fusion/stability for binary multi-layer strain profiles
